overview: Dave Dugan drives a busload of responsibilities â€” from managing the company’s media services team, to forming high value partnerships with agencies and technology companies, to leading the strategic direction of the business. He’s well equipped for this essential role, however, given that he spent the past 11 years with digital marketing giant Digitas, where he most recently led corporate strategy. Dave’s unique daily commute consists of a 15 mile boat ride through the Harbor Islands.
